lines.content: This is a project for Kiwi task management application ‚Äì a Java chatbot-style task manager inspired by Duke. Kiwi helps you organize your to-dos, deadlines, and events through natural language commands in a sleek GUI chat interface. Track your tasks, mark them complete, and stay productive!
Add tasks: todo buy milk, deadline submit /by tomorrow 5pm, event meeting /from 2pm /to 4pm
Manage tasks: list, mark 1, unmark 2, delete 3, find project
Chat interface: Clean Duke-style GUI with task conversation flow
Persistent storage: Tasks saved to data/kiwi.txt
Run ./gradlew run to launch the JavaFX chat GUI. Type commands like todo homework or list to manage your tasks interactively!
1. Open IntelliJ (Welcome screen ‚Üí File > Close Project if needed)
- Click Open ‚Üí Select project folder ‚Üí OK
- Set Project language level ‚Üí SDK default
### Expected: Kiwi GUI launches with chat interface!

> *Kiwi is your personal task manager chatbot. Chat with Kiwi to add, list, delete, and manage your tasks with deadlines and events.*
1. Type commands in the chat input at the bottom
3. Kiwi responds instantly with task updates
Add tasks that expire by a specific date/time.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 4 tasks in the list.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 5 tasks in the list.
Got it. I've added this event:
Now you have 6 tasks in the list.
Here are the tasks in your list:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
Mark tasks as done or toggle status.
[T][X] run ‚úì Nice job, you've completed 1 task!
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
| Add Deadline | `deadline NAME /by DATE` | `deadline report /by tomorrow` |
| Add Event | `event NAME /from START /to END` | `event party /from 8pm /to 10pm` |
**Pro Tip:** Type `list` anytime to see task numbers for delete/mark commands!

<AnchorPane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="600.0" prefWidth="400.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="kiwi.build.MainWindow" style="-fx-background-image: url('/images/background.png')">

<ScrollPane fx:id="scrollPane" fitToWidth="true" hbarPolicy="NEVER" prefHeight="557.0" prefWidth="400.0" style="-fx-control-inner-background: transparent;" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="43.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="0.0">
<TextField fx:id="userInput" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="0.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="76.0" />

<Button fx:id="sendButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="76.0" text="Send" textAlignment="CENTER" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="0.0" />
